mapper.select: SELECT P.PCODE, PNAME, STOCK, TITLE, PRICE, PCONTENT, GNAME, IFNULL(A.COUNTNUM,0) AS COUNTNUM, FLOOR(IFNULL(A.AVGNUM, 0)) AS AVGNUM FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PGROUP PG ON P.GCODE = PG.GCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PCODE, COUNT(*) COUNTNUM, AVG(LIKES) AVGNUM FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PCODE) A ON P.PCODE = A.PCODE WHERE P.PCODE = #{pcode}

SELECT P.PCODE, PNAME, STOCK, TITLE, PRICE, PCONTENT, GNAME, IFNULL(A.COUNTNUM,0) AS COUNTNUM, FLOOR(IFNULL(A.AVGNUM, 0)) AS AVGNUM FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PGROUP PG ON P.GCODE = PG.GCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PCODE, COUNT(*) COUNTNUM, AVG(LIKES) AVGNUM FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PCODE) A ON P.PCODE = A.PCODE WHERE P.GCODE=#{pagename}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* , FLOOR((A.RNUM -1) / #{rows}) + 1 PAGE_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT P.PCODE , PNAME , TITLE , PRICE , STOCK , IFNULL(A.COUNTNUM,0) AS COUNTNUM , FLOOR(IFNULL(A.AVGNUM, 0)) AS AVGNUM , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 RNUM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT) TOTAL_CNT , (SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / #{rows}) FROM PRODUCT) TOTAL_PAGE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PCODE, COUNT(*) COUNTNUM, AVG(LIKES) AVGNUM FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PCODE) A ON P.PCODE = A.PCODE , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R )A )B WHERE B.PAGE_NUMBER = #{page};

mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET PAYCHECK=1 WHERE OCODE=#{ocode}
mapper.select: SELECT O.OCODE, O.PAYCHECK, OD.ORDCOUNT, P.PNAME, P.TITLE, PI.PIMAGE FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDERDETAIL OD ON O.OCODE = OD.OCODE JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PCODE = O.PCODE JOIN PIMAGE PI ON P.PCODE = PI.PCODE WHERE O.UCODE=#{ucode} AND P_SEQ = 1
